body: oumatsu and saimatsu cringe. jesus christ

oh shit there's blood (pic 14)
and what did i just read?

For some context, the “metal pipes” are graduation scrolls. The first page explains that in this doujin, people in love can graduate but only the last people to do the nasty with Kaede gets to graduate with her. Trust me this is a hard story to understand without being able to read it
I ain't got much againist ntr as long as the stories good but keep ntr shit like this out of danganronpa it's bad enough already

I know it’s a doujin and maybe I’m missing context cuz I can’t read it, but this is the most out of character shit ever lmao. Kokichi backed off Shuichi in the love hotel or whatever when he rejected him, like wtf? He’s not just gonna rape kaede like a pro as if hes the ultimate rapist or something lmao
